SEARCH
Package com.xebisco.yield

Klasse TextureRectangle

java.lang.Object
com.xebisco.yield.ComponentBehavior
com.xebisco.yield.AbstractRenderable
com.xebisco.yield.Rectangle
com.xebisco.yield.TextureRectangle
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Behavior, DefaultAxis, Disposable, Renderable
public class TextureRectangle extends Rectangle
This is a class that extends the Rectangle class and adds functionality for rendering textures with options for scaling and processing pixels.

  • Feldübersicht

    Von Schnittstelle geerbte Felder com.xebisco.yield.DefaultAxis

    • isDisposeTexture

      public boolean isDisposeTexture()
      The function returns a boolean value indicating whether the texture should be disposed.
      Gibt zurück:
      The method is returning a boolean value, specifically the value of the variable `disposeTexture`.

    • setDisposeTexture

      public void setDisposeTexture(boolean disposeTexture)
      This function sets a boolean value to determine whether a texture should be disposed or not.
      Parameter:
      disposeTexture - disposeTexture is a boolean parameter that determines whether the texture associated with an object should be disposed of when the object is no longer needed. If disposeTexture is set to true, the texture will be disposed of, freeing up memory. If it is set to false, the texture will not be disposed of
